title: message/send Request Payload
description: Payload for message/send requests. Sends a message to start a new task or continue an existing one.

taskId.title: Task ID
taskId.description: Include to continue an existing task. Omit to start a new task.

idempotencyKey.title: Idempotency Key
idempotencyKey.description: Client-generated key for idempotent task creation. Optional, agent support not guaranteed in v0.1.
